body: Do you plan to support the `to(device, dtype=None, non_blocking=False)` signature? It is available in python. I guess that it is roughly equivalent to `to(at::Type ty, non_blocking=False)`, so maybe we can have that?
body_html: Do you plan to support the to(device, dtype=None, non_blocking=False) signature? It is available in python. I guess that it is roughly equivalent to to(at::Type ty, non_blocking=False), so maybe we can have that?
